Reviews.Title: Recalled
Reviews.Author: laurahi
Reviews.Content: I bought this phone and loved it, until the touch screen stopped working.  When I called AT&T; they informed me that it was recalled in 2009.  There is nothing they can do for you either, so don't even waste your money.  It will work for a few months and then NOTHING.  Now I am out the money.  Amazon should take this item off it's site.

Reviews.Title: Loved this phone!
Reviews.Author: onyx_cross
Reviews.Content: I bought this phone when it first came out. Which I guess was three years ago? For a touch screen this phone was very durable! I'm a horse rider so I useually go through phones like I do clothes. I've had horses "eat" my phone before. Anyways, I dopped my phone to many times to count on concrete,in mud among other things, the screen never cracked unlike the Iphone and other touch screens. People say it's a crappy phone, though I do not agree.  I don't think its the phones I honestly think it's just At&t.; I will definitly be buying this phone again!

Reviews.Title: ths phone
Reviews.Author: person000
Reviews.Content: This phone worked ok when i first got it, but after a couple of weeks the touch screen would feeze up when i was texting and i had to reset it ever time it did that. Also when i go some where i keep my phone in my back pocket but every time i would put it there it would turn of and i would have to take the battery out to get it to come back on. Theres one more thing you should know before getting this phone. IT IS BIG!! Its so fat and heavy its not worth what i paid for. Trust me this phone is not worth what i paid for,ive had this phone for only couple of months and ive all ready bought a new one of of amazon. i regret buying this phone and i wish i could return it.

Reviews.Title: ATT phone
Reviews.Author: dave21
Reviews.Content: the phone works fine. But I have come to realize that AT&T; gets kind of pissy if you don't buy the phone from them & add a 2 year contract. I had some trouble getting them to turn on the texting feature as I already had the sim card for it that is not under contract. Instead they turned off the texting to my other phones as well. It took almost a week for them to get it straight. they kept trying to say we had to add a new line & contract. I already had the line for 4 years & definitely did NOT want another contract.& then last week the phone did one of those automatic updates & AT&T; killed the sim card & I now have to replace it. But AT&T; must pay for it. So all in all I am satisfied with the phone & the speed of delivery, however I have nothing good to say about AT&T.; Since they took over Cingular ( who I never had problems with ) they SUCK more than I can truly say. There is a reason why they have the WORST customer satisfaction rating.

Reviews.Title: Battery doesnt hold much charge
Reviews.Author: Text machine
Reviews.Content: Love the phone nice to text with but the battery doesn't hold much charge only get a couple hours out of it

Reviews.Title: love love it
Reviews.Author: mrszman
Reviews.Content: We ordered two of these phones, one for my husband and one for my son. They both love this phone! The delivery was quick, the phones are wonderful, and the price was great!! Def. would buy again and again!

Reviews.Title: THIS PHONE SUCKS!!!!!!
Reviews.Author: Julie
Reviews.Content: If you like crappy, sucky phones, then this is the one for you! This phone has to be charged every hour for it to work, does this phone sound great or what?!  The touch screen is awesome if you like the screen freezing up every five seconds and after five minutes straight you still can't press the button on the screen! My phone freezes up every day once or twice and so does my sisters! The last thing i would like to say about this "great phone" is that it's the size of a brick. I mean seriously, if you want a texting brick, then THIS is the phone for you! Oh, I almost forgot i hope you don't text a lot because if you do, then the paint will wear off on the buttons! The ONLY good thing about this phone is that it is orange and orange is my favorite color. Well thats all i have to say here, but beware crappy phones! I will find you and bring you to justice, so helpless people don't have to suffer any longer. Yah, I'm a teenager and teenagers don't like crappy phones that don't work!

Reviews.Title: my phone
Reviews.Author: B
Reviews.Content: It's a good phone but its not a smart phone so I was a little disappointed. It's shouldn't be categorized with the smart phone. Other than that is a good product.

Reviews.Title: ATT Quickfire
Reviews.Author: E
Reviews.Content: Went through two "refurbished" in as many weeks both malfunctioned within a few days.  The supplier did send a replacement and was good to deal with though.I do NOT reccomend.

Reviews.Title: Good phone!
Reviews.Author: Carl
Reviews.Content: Great phone! My daughter needed a replacement and this fit the bill. We thought it wasn't functioning properly at first, but soon discovered it was our own mistake. I contacted the seller and they were very helpful!

Reviews.Title: Fun Phone!
Reviews.Author: lookinandseemealt
Reviews.Content: Bought phone for daughter and she has had no issues with use or performance! Fun slide out works great! Great item!  She loves the color!  Delivered by purposed date!

Reviews.Title: Quickfire
Reviews.Author: smdarling
Reviews.Content: Cable tv internet and much more i bought this for my fiance and he seems to find something more to like about it everyday

Reviews.Title: danger for this phone
Reviews.Author: dfuller40
Reviews.Content: After buying this phone there are alot of concerns about it catching on fire I wish I would have payed more attention to the reviews.

Reviews.Title: Phones a rip off
Reviews.Author: Shawnee
Reviews.Content: Phone won't slide up doesnt work with my AT&T; sim card very disappointed worse Christmas gift you could ever give to someone

Reviews.Title: AT&T; QUICKFIRE GTX75 CELL PHONE IN ORANGE
Reviews.Author: KC1234
Reviews.Content: I MUST TELL U BUYERS BEWARE!! OF THIS CELL PHONE BY AT&T; QUICKFIRE GTX75 SLIDER I BOUGHT THIS CELL PHONE HAD IT LESS THAN 1 WEEK AND THE ANTENNA BROKE ON THE INSIDE OF THE PHONE!! IT'S A HEAVY CELL PHONE IT KEPT SLIDING OPEN!! PLEASE DON'T EVEN WAIST YOUR TIME !! U WILL BE DISAPOINTED!! THE RECEPTIONIS ABSOULTY LOUSY STATIC!!  PLEASE READ THIS REVIEW BEFORE BUYING THIS CELL IT'S IMPORTANT THAT THEREIS MORE NEGATIVE THAN POSITIVE!!! THANK U!!!

Reviews.Title: Great "Texter" for Teens!
Reviews.Author: familyof3
Reviews.Content: This phone was bought as a gift for our teen age girl, she went nuts!  LOVES IT!  A great little texting phone for a teenager without having to invest alot of $$$.  Had a little problem with the charger, but OEM Shop replaced it quickly and all is fine.

Reviews.Title: Piece of Crap
Reviews.Author: Nitasha
Reviews.Content: This phone is garbage. I've had it for a few short months and it apparently needs to watch Sesame Street to find out what the letter "E" is. I have to mash the "E" key extra hard to get it to type. The keys are slowly dying, the phone itself dies on its own at random, the battery life drops off whenever it wants... It takes forever to start back up, has a loud, annoying intro that can only be turned off if the phone is on "silent". Its just a bulky, heavy load of pumpkin colored crap. Don't waste your money!

Reviews.Title: At&t; quickfire cellphone
Reviews.Author: Fluffy12
Reviews.Content: I liked the phone. When i first got it, there was a few pictures of someone and text messages still saved in the phone's memory. When u are selling something u should have it as new as can be and with those pictures and seeing those texts messages on the cellphone, it kinda made me feel like there might be something else  wrong with the fone but no. Everything else looked good to me.

Reviews.Title: no good!
Reviews.Author: lomer88
Reviews.Content: Constantly searches for signal...hard to operate the touch screen. Looks and feels cheap ! I wouldn't reccoment buying this item nor would I consider it in the future!

Reviews.Title: Great phone
Reviews.Author: Jorielle Belanger
Reviews.Content: This is a great phone for the price. Very easy to use. I have had no issues with this phone.

Reviews.Title: NOT WORTH IT DO NOT BUY THIS!
Reviews.Author: Shea "shea"
Reviews.Content: DO NOT BUY!!! It doesn't last long and there isn't many great features on it. It dies fast and is just a terrible phone that will end up breaking. Not worth it, trust me.

Reviews.Title: Very Dissappointed
Reviews.Author: levi redman
Reviews.Content: Phone started up just fine, however, it shut down everytime I pushed on the screen (touch screen) or tried to make a call. Worst $40 I ever spent.

Reviews.Title: Terrible!
Reviews.Author: Lynette
Reviews.Content: Touchscreen locks up and freezes.  I am constantly have to take the battery out to restart the phone.  DO NOT RECOMMEND!

Reviews.Title: Good phone.
Reviews.Author: dawnesea
Reviews.Content: Never had anything but a little cheap phone so this is big step up from that. It is not an iphone and won't perform like one but it is a good touch screen with all the functions that I need.

Reviews.Title: DO NOT BUY!!
Reviews.Author: Quickfire
Reviews.Content: Although this phone might look nice and everything, Its really just a piece of crap. I wouldnt ever buy another one. Its slow the button are to close to eachother, you cannot put any personalized ringtones, the touch screen doesnt work good at all. Its just awful.

Reviews.Title: Not Smartphone
Reviews.Author: April
Reviews.Content: This phone works just fine for basic phone usage, such as phonecalls and texting, however it is NOT a smartphone. The ad is a bit misleading that with the new technology of touch screens, apps, gps, etc. that you could think the phone is newer than it really is. The internet is hardly considered accessible from this device, very slow. Not recommended for someone who is used to or wants a smartphone device.

Reviews.Title: Temporary phone
Reviews.Author: Latoya D. Neri "Mrs. Neri"
Reviews.Content: This phone was a replacement phone for me after I lost my smartphone. I got it because it was cheap and I currently waiting for the release of the Iphone 5. I don't recommend it to anyone who is accustomed to using the smart phones because you will be highly disappointed. It would be a great beginner's phone for children.

Reviews.Title: Menus are horrible
Reviews.Author: ringsarah
Reviews.Content: I used one of these for months. It was a very annoying phone. I gave it three stars because the music player was pretty good and it synced with my Ford via bluetooth to play music and make calls very easily. It can also handle a fall very well. The menus are set up really weird and it takes awhile to learn to navigate through messaging and such. I found out it was recalled because it catches on fire while on the charger, but they keep selling it. I dont understand this.

Reviews.Title: Terrible device
Reviews.Author: Sam
Reviews.Content: I have since gotten rid of this phone but wanted to add to the warnings against it. First off, At&t; recalled this phone because it was catching fire (/irony).My major complaint was that the touch screen is incredibly inaccurate. From the main menu, I would click messaging and it would launch the web browser (on the other side of the screen in horizontal view). This would start racking up data for a plan I had no data on (which means overage charges). I was finally able to get At&t; to disable the data, but the phone was still not worth the headache.Battery life is terrible, but what can you expect when you put your name on a device that was outsourced to the lowest bidder (UTStarcom).

Reviews.Title: disappointed
Reviews.Author: hillbilly
Reviews.Content: its ok the screen freezes then shuts off then u turn it back on and its real slow for a few minutes the pink keys against the orange background is very hard to see u have to touch the screen several times before it moves i was very disappointed alot of problems this phone should b taken off

Reviews.Title: Item Was Great Until
Reviews.Author: Gjerm
Reviews.Content: Over all the product is new and looks as though it hasn't been used. So the products appearance looked nice and this is probably something the seller isn't able to fix but the battery decreases quickly and I have had to charge it couple times a day but the phone hasn't completely die. I haven't charged it in 3 days and the battery is empty and I'm waiting for it to die. Yeah that's the only problem with phone itself it don't tell the battery percent right. But over all i give this a 10 out 10 product! The bonus is that you can use T Mobile or any other carrier that uses a SIMs card. FYI

Reviews.Title: At&t; Quickfire
Reviews.Author: Brytni
Reviews.Content: The at&t; quickfire is a waste of money. You can only text with the keyboard, which is really inconvienient if your hands are full, and the touch screen doesn't work over half of the time. I bought my phone brand new and it came with a scratch on it. The phone will randomely turn off and freeze up. I would NOT RECOMEND this phone for anyone! Don't waiste your money.

Reviews.Title: Dumb phne
Reviews.Author: Dumb phone
Reviews.Content: My at&t; sims card dosent work for this phone nd dont know what to do im going to at&t; nd see if they can fix the dum rip off

Reviews.Title: Don't buy this phone!
Reviews.Author: J. Zaks
Reviews.Content: I purchased this phone and It was the biggest mistake. It is the worst phone I ever had. It worked for maybe 2 weeks and then it started to freeze all the time to the point I can't use it. Don't buy this phone.

Reviews.Title: Help?
Reviews.Author: Karaaa
Reviews.Content: I just orderd this phone a few days ago and i was wondering since it says its an unlocked phone will it still work even tho i have a t mobile sims card???

Reviews.Title: defective product
Reviews.Author: ramaya_8332
Reviews.Content: This cell phone was not manufactured to last long. The function of the phone is dependent on the touch screen and once this screen does not work you cannot use the phone any longer. Also, this phone is bulgy. Would not recommend. I just wanted a simple phone for cheap. I feel like I was ripped off. Buyers beware.

Reviews.Title: quickfire GTX75 SUCKS
Reviews.Author: 242bahamas
Reviews.Content: OMG what a big rip off. anyone in the 242 RUN FOR YOUR LIFE, this is the worst phone in the whole wide world. its not even fit for a DOG

Rollover Unused Anytime Minutes Every Month
Talk and Surf At The Same Time
Enjoy Touch Screen Control And Full QWERTY Keyboard
Watch Streaming AT&T; TV, or Listen To Streaming Radio
Bluetooth Wireless Technology With Streaming Stereo Music Support
